name: BookmarkMe Bot
description: A GroupMe chatbot that allows you to bookmark messages for later viewing.

BOT_ID.description: The bot ID from GroupMe dev portal

BOT_NAME.description: The bot name that appears in the chat

TRIGGER_ADD.description: The prefix used to bookmark a message

TRIGGER_ALL.description: The keyword used to show all saved bookmarks

TRIGGER_DELETE.description: The prefix used to delete a bookmark

TRIGGER_SHOW.description: The prefix used to display a saved bookmark
